content.json:
# Azure AI Agent Service Insights

Use this workbook to analyze and monitor all your Azure AI Agent Service resources, including agent operations, thread activities, tool calls, and performance metrics.

parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.label: Subscriptions
parameters.description: All subscriptions with Azure AI Services
parameters.query:
Resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.cognitiveservices/accounts"
| summarize Count = count() by subscriptionId
| order by Count desc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project value = subscriptionId, label = subscriptionId, selected = false

parameters.name: Resources
parameters.label: AI Agent Service
parameters.query:
Resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.cognitiveservices/accounts"
| order by name asc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project value = id, label = id, selected = Rank <= 5

content.json:
### Azure AI Agent Service Overview

Get comprehensive insights into your AI Agent Service deployment, including resource distribution, agent operations, and performance metrics.

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.cognitiveservices/accounts"
| where name in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize count(type) by subscriptionId
content.title: Count by Subscription Id

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.cognitiveservices/accounts"
| where name in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize count(type) by resourceGroup
content.title: Count by Resource Group

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.cognitiveservices/accounts"
| where name in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize count(type) by location
content.title: Count by Location

content.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.cognitiveservices/accounts"
| where name in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| extend Details = pack_all()
| project Resource=id, resourceGroup, location, subscriptionId, kind, SKU=sku.name, publicNetworkAccess=properties.publicNetworkAccess, dateCreated=properties.dateCreated, tags, Details
content.title: Azure AI Agent Service Resources
content.noDataMessage: No AI Agent Service resources found.

items.name: query - All AI Agent Service Resources

content.json:
### Azure AI Agent Service Monitoring

Monitor your agent operations, performance, and tool usage in real-time.

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize TotalRequests=count()
content.title: Total Requests

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize SuccessRate = round(todouble(countif(ResultType == "Success")) / count() * 100, 2)
content.title: Success Rate %

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize AvgLatency = round(avg(DurationMs), 2)
content.title: Avg Latency (ms)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize P95Latency = round(percentile(DurationMs, 95), 2)
content.title: P95 Latency (ms)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| where ResultType == "Failed" or httpStatusCode_d >= 400
| summarize ErrorCount = count()
content.title: Total Errors

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize SuccessRate = round(todouble(countif(ResultType == "Success")) / count() * 100, 2) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: Success Rate Trend (%)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize AvgLatency=avg(DurationMs), P50=percentile(DurationMs, 50), P95=percentile(DurationMs, 95), P99=percentile(DurationMs, 99) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: Latency Percentiles Over Time (ms)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| where OperationName has_any ("Create_Assistant", "Create_Thread", "Create_Run", "Submit_Tool_Outputs")
| summarize Count=count() by OperationName
| order by Count desc
content.title: Operations by Type

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| extend StatusCode = tostring(ResultType)
| summarize Count=count() by StatusCode
| order by Count desc
content.title: Requests by Status

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize TotalCalls=count(), SuccessCount=countif(ResultType == "Success"), FailureCount=countif(ResultType == "Failed"), AvgDuration=avg(DurationMs), P95Duration=percentile(DurationMs, 95) by OperationName
| extend SuccessRate = round(todouble(SuccessCount) / TotalCalls * 100, 2)
| project OperationName, TotalCalls, SuccessCount, FailureCount, SuccessRate, AvgDuration, P95Duration
| order by TotalCalls desc
content.title: Operations Summary with Success Rates

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize RequestCount=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), Resource
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: Daily Request Volume by Resource (for Cost Estimation)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize TotalRequests=count() by Resource
| extend Percentage = round(todouble(TotalRequests) / toscalar(AzureDiagnostics | where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES" | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query} | where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", ")) | count) * 100, 2)
| order by TotalRequests desc
content.title: Request Distribution by Resource

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize TotalRequests=count(), AvgLatency=round(avg(DurationMs), 2), P95Latency=round(percentile(DurationMs, 95), 2), SuccessRate=round(todouble(countif(ResultType == "Success")) / count() * 100, 2), ErrorCount=countif(ResultType == "Failed" or httpStatusCode_d >= 400) by Resource
| order by TotalRequests desc
content.title: Performance Comparison Across Resources

content.json:
---
## Agent-Specific Metrics
Detailed breakdown by Agent, Thread, and Tool usage

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| where OperationName contains "agent" or OperationName contains "Assistant"
| summarize Runs=count(), SuccessfulRuns=countif(ResultType == "Success"), FailedRuns=countif(ResultType == "Failed"), AvgDuration=avg(DurationMs) by OperationName
| extend SuccessRate = round(todouble(SuccessfulRuns) / Runs * 100, 2)
| order by Runs desc
content.title: Agent Performance Metrics

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| where OperationName contains "Tool" or OperationName contains "Function"
| summarize ToolCalls=count() by OperationName
| order by ToolCalls desc
| take 10
content.title: Top 10 Tools Used

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize TotalRequests=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: Request Volume Over Time

content.json:
---
## Detailed Activity Logs
Click on any row to see full details

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| extend StatusCode = tostring(httpStatusCode_d)
| project TimeGenerated, OperationName, ResultType, StatusCode, DurationMs, CallerIPAddress, Resource, requestUri_s, properties_s
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| take 500
content.title: Activity Logs (Latest 500)

content.json:
### Azure AI Agent Service Insights

Detailed logs and insights into your agent activities, tool calls, and failures.

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize TotalRequests=count(), 
            SlowRequests=countif(DurationMs > 5000),
            VerySlowRequests=countif(DurationMs > 10000),
            FailedRequests=countif(ResultType == "Failed"),
            AvgDuration=round(avg(DurationMs), 2)
| extend SlowRequestPercentage = round(todouble(SlowRequests) / TotalRequests * 100, 2)
| extend FailureRate = round(todouble(FailedRequests) / TotalRequests * 100, 2)
| project Metric = "Summary", TotalRequests, SlowRequests, SlowRequestPercentage, FailedRequests, FailureRate, AvgDuration
content.title: ⚠️ Performance & Reliability Summary

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| where DurationMs > 5000
| summarize SlowRequestCount=count(), AvgDuration=round(avg(DurationMs), 2), MaxDuration=round(max(DurationMs), 2) by OperationName
| order by SlowRequestCount desc
| take 10
content.title: Top 10 Slowest Operations (>5s)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| summarize RequestsPerHour=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), CallerIPAddress
| where RequestsPerHour > 100
| order by RequestsPerHour desc
| take 10
content.title: Top 10 High-Volume Callers (>100 req/hr)

content.json:
### Thread & Run Analysis
Track conversation threads and agent runs

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| where OperationName contains "Thread" or OperationName contains "Message"
| summarize Operations=count(), Duration=sum(DurationMs), FirstSeen=min(TimeGenerated), LastSeen=max(TimeGenerated) by OperationName, Resource
| extend ThreadLifetime = LastSeen - FirstSeen
| order by Operations desc
| take 20
content.title: Top 20 Active Thread Operations

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| where OperationName contains "Run"
| summarize Count=count() by ResultType
| order by Count desc
content.title: Run Status Distribution

content.json:
---
### Tool Call Analysis
Detailed tool usage and performance

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| where OperationName contains "Tool" or OperationName contains "Function"
| summarize ToolCalls=count(), AvgDuration=avg(DurationMs), SuccessRate=round(todouble(countif(ResultType == "Success")) / count() * 100, 2) by OperationName, Resource
| order by ToolCalls desc
content.title: Tool Performance by Service

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| where OperationName contains "Tool" or OperationName contains "Function"
| summarize ToolCalls=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), OperationName
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: Tool Usage Timeline

content.json:
---
### Error & Failure Analysis
Diagnostic information for troubleshooting

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| where ResultType == "Failed" or httpStatusCode_d >= 400
| summarize Failures=count(), LastOccurrence=max(TimeGenerated) by Resource, OperationName, tostring(httpStatusCode_d), ResultType
| order by Failures desc
content.title: Failures by Error Type

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.COGNITIVESERVICES"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:query}
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resources:label}", ", "))
| extend StatusCode = tostring(httpStatusCode_d)
| project TimeGenerated, OperationName, ResultType, StatusCode, DurationMs, CallerIPAddress, Resource, requestUri_s, properties_s
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| take 100
content.title: Detailed Log Entries (Click to View Full Details)

content.json:
---
## 📚 Monitoring Guide & Alert Recommendations

### 🎯 Recommended SLA Targets:
- **Success Rate**: ≥ 99.5%
- **P95 Latency**: < 3 seconds
- **P99 Latency**: < 5 seconds
- **Error Rate**: < 0.5%

### ⚠️ Alert Thresholds:

**Critical Alerts:**
- Success rate drops below 95%
- Error rate exceeds 5%
- P95 latency exceeds 10 seconds

**Warning Alerts:**
- Success rate between 95-99%
- Error rate between 1-5%
- P95 latency between 5-10 seconds
- Slow requests (>5s) exceed 10%

### 🔍 Troubleshooting Tips:

**High Latency:**
1. Check the "Top 10 Slowest Operations" for patterns
2. Review tool call performance - some tools may be slow
3. Examine thread complexity - long conversations may increase latency
4. Consider scaling up your AI service tier

**High Error Rate:**
1. Review "Failures by Error Type" table
2. Check HTTP status codes (429 = throttling, 500 = service error)
3. Verify resource quotas and limits
4. Check caller IP patterns for potential abuse

**Cost Optimization:**
1. Review "Daily Request Volume" for usage patterns
2. Identify peak usage times for capacity planning
3. Check "Request Distribution by Resource" to balance load
4. Consider caching for frequently repeated requests

### 📊 How to Use This Workbook:

1. **Overview Tab**: Get resource inventory and distribution
2. **Monitor Tab**: Track real-time health, performance, and trends
3. **Insights Tab**: Deep-dive into issues, patterns, and optimization opportunities

### 🔗 Useful Links:
- [Azure AI Agent Service Documentation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/agents/)
- [Monitoring Reference](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-foundry/agents/reference/monitor-service)
- [Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/calculator/)
- [Azure Monitor Alerts](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/alerts/alerts-overview)
